{{Description|"So the waves roiled, swallowing the crown of the nobles. And ever after did each drop amidst the icy waves reflect a golden crown, each and every droplet of the spray shining with its light."}}
'''Icetide Vortex''' is [[Eula]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|1.5|2.5}}
* Each Grimheart buff stack is indicated at their gain by an icon above Eula and during their possession by the intensity of her mantle's glow, with the first stack showing a sword icon and giving her mantle a slight glow, and the second stack showing an icon of two crossed swords and giving her mantle a bright glow.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Eula|talent=Icetide Vortex|ascension|1|Roiling Rime}}
* {{Talent Note|character=Eula|talent=Icetide Vortex|ascension|2|Wellspring of War-Lust}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|1|Tidal Illusion}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Lady of Seafoam}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Chivalric Quality}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Noble Obligation}}
